member.name: D3D10_COLOR_WRITE_ENABLE
member.summary: Identify which components of each pixel of a render target are writable during blending.

member.name: D3D10_COLOR_WRITE_ENABLE.D3D10_COLOR_WRITE_ENABLE_RED
member.summary: Allow data to be stored in the red component.

member.name: D3D10_COLOR_WRITE_ENABLE.D3D10_COLOR_WRITE_ENABLE_GREEN
member.summary: Allow data to be stored in the green component.

member.name: D3D10_COLOR_WRITE_ENABLE.D3D10_COLOR_WRITE_ENABLE_BLUE
member.summary: Allow data to be stored in the blue component.

member.name: D3D10_COLOR_WRITE_ENABLE.D3D10_COLOR_WRITE_ENABLE_ALPHA
member.summary: Allow data to be stored in the alpha component.

member.name: D3D10_COLOR_WRITE_ENABLE.D3D10_COLOR_WRITE_ENABLE_ALL
member.summary: Allow data to be stored in all components.
